title: Ticket #595: Store CondorView database in more generic format
description: To support collecting arbitrary data, we'll need to reconsider how we store data, either replacing the existing system, or running a new system in parallel. This might be an opportunity to move to something like SQLite. This is likely a prerequisite for #594.
remarks:
2009-Jun-25 15:46:02 by adesmet:
How we currently store this information and the user visible interface (condor_status) is documented at DetailsAboutCondorStats,
